lines.text: "Get on with you." He puts his hammer back at his side. They all separate, stare you down as you walk past.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Good day. Back to the tavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way through the alleyways, eventually back towards the building proper. What would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just going to watch, that's all. Do I see any security details? See who's guarding the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are Carvers doing rounds around the city. On the streets wandering through in pairs, keeping watch. You don't see any particular guard outside, but you do see individuals moving past windows. There's a little bit of light from the inside of the buildings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No Carvers or any sort of guard detail outside the house? Anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not between the gates. The yard area and to the front door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Heavily heavily guarded by the looks of what's inside and what's outside the gate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's outside the gate? You're hard pressed to find a moment where the street isn't visible to some Carver. This area is pretty well guarded. You figure largely because the person who is currently the Ironkeeper of the entire city of Kraghammer lives within that building as well as one of the more powerful dwarven families, so it's pretty well watched.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to head back to the inn, then. I'm not going to poke the bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all eventually gather back at the tavern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (exhausted sigh) How was your night?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was wonderful, I don't know about you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hickies? Is that a Gnomish STD?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have comment cards, so this will all work out well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! here! Here you go, here you go--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Success all around! Did you learn anything, Vex and Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There seem to be lots of Carvers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a knock at the room that you guys are currently talking in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless, are you in the tavern proper or have you gone back to-- ?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're in a room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll get it! (clears throat) Hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Adra's standing there looking a little nervous and she goes, "Hi, sorry to bother you. Is "that bear one of yours?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Trinket! Isn't he adorable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You might want to go," You hear in the tavern: (aggravated growls)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be right back. I head downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head downstairs and you can see all the dwarves are now gathered around the fighting ring in the center of the tavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's now inside the ring with a couple other dwarves around, prodding and pushing it into the ring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no! No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's raucous cheering. They're not even listening to you at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I followed my sister downstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I come down too. It's party time!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run down to with Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you guys head down, you can see now Balgus is now up and rubbing his chin. "Oh, never "fought a bear before! (laughs)"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Balgus! Fuck! Trinket, come here! Are we allowed to cuss? Trinket, come here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are very much allowed to cuss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Isn't that right, guys? Fuck yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, and I run into the ring with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you run into the ring a couple of the dwarves pat you on the back, you get a shove into the ring. It's now Trinket and you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I'll take on this bear! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, all right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general charisma check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it! Fuck that bear up!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pushing my way through the crowd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one of the series, everybody! First one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush and you guys are coming to the front, Balgus sees this and now you can see both eyes are open which means he's sobered up a bit, and he goes, "Oh no! This bear's mine. You "want to fight two of us? Oh, it'll wake you right up!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nothing as invigorating as as a brawl!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to fucking fight him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast a fog. Over the ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some are like, "What the hell's going on? Fucking hell. Why is there--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I run up in the fog, and I tap Trinket and I whisper in Trinket's ear and I say: Trinket, I'm tapping you out. And I turn into a bear like Trinket!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. First, I Polymorph Trinket into a squirrel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp) You can do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can. No, a mouse, like a rat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Little tiny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You see the shadows nearby the fog you hear, "Come at me, I'm going to--" You can see Balgus's shadow swinging wildly at the air, angrily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to fight him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab Trinket. Trinket shrinks down into a tiny little mouse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say: Scanlan! Catch Trinket!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket, the little mouse face, the moment you see it, looks very confused, very scared.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay. I'll protect it. Don't worry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I bear form up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (whoosh) into a bear form. Now Keyleth is now this giant bear where Trinket once was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got my money on Ballsack!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't bet against the enemy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the fog I somersault over some random dwarf and pull out my dagger, but turn it around in my hand and whack Balgus in the back of the head as hard as I can, just to try and knock him out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you see in fog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a really good fighter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Low light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage because you are in fog.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm at the balcony by the way. Watching all this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have advantage, roll twice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're watching what they're doing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember, he's our friend. We don't want to kill him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm taking a short rest, you all can do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Balgus's drunken, mist covered state does not seem to notice your approach. He is swinging wildly, though. He has disadvantaged attack on you as you approach. One of his fists swings past you. That is going to be a 12, I don't think that hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just narrowly dodge out of the way. You can feel the fist just whoosh past one of your ears. As you come back up, clutching the base of your dagger, go for your strike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on taint butter, you got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's no good. Oh, I have advantage on the attack roll for this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because he does not see you, yes. You are currently stealthed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's much better. 26!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit. Go ahead and roll sneak attack damage on this, of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus regular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't kill him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, we're considering it nonlethal damage because it's with the base of the dagger.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm having an ale while watching all this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're watching a lot of fog, with some shapes moving in it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm like: This is fog! Probably Keyleth's spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm blindly looking for Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trinket's in my hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like, "Where's Trinket?" You see a giant bear there and you're like, "There's "Trinket! That's not Trinket. There's no armor."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're very confused. Trinket now has no armor, is a slightly different shade--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he's close enough! Man, come on, I've been around Trinket enough.

lines.name: ORION, MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, man!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 27, right in the base of his skull.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Balgus hasn't moved, by the way. You impact and it's like hitting a wall. There's this taut, thick stump of muscle where the dwarf neck is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull back the dagger, his hand reaches up and grabs your wrist. His head slowly turns towards you and he goes, (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bonus action to disengage. Disengage as a rogue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well he's going to attempt to grapple you.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an acrobatics check; it's probably your best score anyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Oh, that's fine! That's a 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 30?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's still this, "Okay, what's going on?" kind of a feel. You hear Adra in the back going, "Stop this! This is-- I can't even see! What are you doing?! Don't destroy another table!" She's frantically trying to stop this chaos. There's now a bear-- what are you doing, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a bear and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a bear.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (like Marisha) I'm a bear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a bear, you want to do anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the shape of Balgus like-- in the middle of this fight ring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do some tricks! Do some tricks! Start clapping and, like, dancing around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's a good idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is what she tells you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see her as my trainer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dance!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm like (growling). I'm circus bear-ing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everyone! Gather round and watch the amazing Trinket do his tricks!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I start playing music from my shawm instrument. Which exists.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A rousing jaunty bear-like tune.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to cast Prestidigitation and do fireworks on top of that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should give me a fez! Can you Prestidigitation me a fez?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can I do little hats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't done a fez yet. You need to work on that. A couple more levels.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No. I'll try. Paper hat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin singing your tune. Do you give an inspiration dice to her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I would love to give her an inspiration dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A d8 inspiration dice from the bard as you hear the enchanting, jaunty, bear dancing theme.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Oh, look over there! It's a bear! Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a performance check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she does. You're performing as a bear!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to add performance dice?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at that, a fucking bear dance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, the inspiration dice that he gave you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! It's a natural 20!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Okay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I want to save it! I'm inspired, for later. I will think back to that moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were so inspired, you weren't even inspired to be inspired for this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's now this general jovial air restored to the tavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab an empty cup off of the table and say: Tips for the bear, right here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to get money for this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I beeline to the bar and say: A large mug of ale, please. As soon as it's ready, bring it right over to Balgus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way to the bar. You see Adra's really nervous, like, (panicked sounds)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can fix this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How? Do! Go!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quickly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here, go!" She hands you one, doesn't even charge you for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still dancing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looking for Balgus in the crowd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's still in the center of the ring. No one's still getting near Balgus. They're cheering off to the side. Balgus is laughing. "Ooh, growl for me! Do a happy growl!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (growls)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, there's a happy growl! Oh, it's been so long since I've been outside!" A little tear on the edge of his face. As you approach up his side--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Arm around his shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately, instinctively, he slaps it off his arm and turns around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here, take this, and after this one there's three more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's drunk, you're offering him ale, and he's been laughing at a bear for two minutes. Make a persuasion roll with advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! Persuasion, you say? 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two rolls, yeah, you have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's fighting their way through. At which point now, Balgus slaps you on the shoulder, takes a drink, and wanders out of the fight ring, goes and finds a table to sit down and begin chugging what you gave him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we adjourn for the evening? Retire to our rooms?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you go change out of bear form?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and I guess I can let Trinket change out of mouse form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you wait until we're upstairs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take the mouse? Can I take Trinket?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, rat-mouse-thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, hi, Trinket! Oh, is his armor teeny tiny too?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, does he have a tiny armor mouse? Mouse armor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you choose, while polymorphing him, you could make it as a visual aesthetic. Because it was a quick impact, I would say it looks like a normal mouse right now. Sorry. Next time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well you're still adorable little-- don't poke him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (squeaks)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stick him in my little pocket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab a half a mug of ale off the table and say, "Dwarven compatriots, we could not have "expected a better welcome here in Kraghammer! We'll see you tomorrow night for round two. Thank "you, one and all."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Huzzah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering) Balgus goes, "Three more! You said three more!" You see his empty cup on the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did say three more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I laugh and hustle her over and say: One, two, three, put them in a row for this gentleman right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye! (whispers) Thanks." She gives you like a really earnest like, "Thank you." You now have a very good idea of how a good third of the tables in this tavern are repaired.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's tough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys head back up to the rooms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You put some stank on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that was like a (vibrating) when you got the impact on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't fight him, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Grog's going to fight him at some point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I get the feeling that's probably going to go down at some point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's going to be playmates with me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just a misunderstanding. I'm sure he's a lovely gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, it's not a hallway built for a bear. Your shoulders are squeezing through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How big is the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, each one of your rooms comfortably fits two people, maybe. Like, one and a half?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. What will I do with Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, dwarves are fairly wide folk, so the doors are built for stouter folk, they're just not very tall. You, actually, have to bend through, Grog, to get into your room. On the bed that you lie on, your legs dangle a good two feet off the bottom, at maximum. You can push Trinket through with a one, two, three! Or you can carry her through as a mouse, and then have her stuck in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all right. Neither of us need a blanket now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long can I keep her a mouse?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Him! Trinket's a boy, all of you, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Up to an hour?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe it is, yeah, concentration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, are there like stables?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, yeah. Can I go downstairs and ask about stables? Maybe he can stay in the stables.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to talk to Adra. She's like, "There's no stables in this establishment, but we do have a downstairs storage area your bear can probably stay in."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he's a bear, he's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, is that okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Trinket) Yeah, I'm fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, yeah, he's seems to think it's all right. Let's go with the storage room. If there's anything that looks edible, you can eat it. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's not true."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bring Trinket back down. Do you release your polymorph?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket becomes a bear again. I'd say the room's probably a good 40 feet by 30 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so he's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half of it's filled with barrels and crates, and storage of dried foods. Trinket comes in and (sniffing) and starts rummaging into one of the half open sacks of dried meat. That's going to be put on your bill.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head back to your rooms for the evening to rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take a nap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything you guys want to do in preparation for the next day?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, let's get it on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we should give our comment cards to Balgus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should all turn in our comment cards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, our comments cards, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn in your comment cards for Balan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Balan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't stress how important this is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we should-- go ahead, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, really, no it's fine, speak over me, I don't care.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, take him the extras.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to give him a few extras so he can have more comments.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys are so kind with these comment cards.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perhaps we should all go to bed, and the humans back in North Hollywood should take a pee break. At some point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The humans?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You. You, and you and you and you and me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, indeed. Do you want to take a quick restroom break for the folks here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zac?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Folks here might want to use the restroom real fast.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You want me to play the intro videos again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hang tight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Commercial break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Most nights, Grog can be found challenging entire taverns to wrestling matches! Or accompanying Scanlan to the nearest house where you pay for lady favors. Also ale!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Part of the Aramente is proving yourself a strong warrior, a valiant protector, and a wise and compassionate leader. With this knowledge, one thought plays in repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When he awoke, Percy began to design his first gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you haven't heard of Scanlan Shorthalt? Well, gird your loins, ladies, because he has his eye on you. A talented musician, master of disguise, and dashingly handsome in his own mind, Scanlan sings songs almost as much as he sings his own praises. Born a poor gnome, Scanlan used his endless charm and soaring tenor voice to croon for coin and support his single mother. One day, he was discovered by a half-orc promoter, and joined Dr. Dranzel's Spectacular Traveling Troupe where he learned the ways of the world, and honed his skills as a bard extraordinaire. A loner much of his life, Scanlan has never quite come to terms with the violent death of his mother at the hands of a goblin invasion. While his years on the road provided many, shall we say, educational experiences with the opposite sex, deep down Scanlan yearns for the one thing he's never known: the true love of a fellow gnome. Still, Scanlan considers himself a lover first, performer second, and fighter distant third. On the battlefield, he'll support his allies, but rarely draws blood, unless it's to protect fellow gnome, Pike. Count on Scanlan for a hearty laugh, a rollicking song, and a twinkle in his eye that melts hearts and makes the females swoon.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Going from town to town and making friends and allies in and for the name of Draconia. Being a red dragonborn, I had quite the task on my hands in that respect, but it was exactly what I needed so I could explore the world and find these artifacts, as I felt the truth was out there. Some may describe me as buffoonish, but I say poppycock to all that. I am much sharper than most give me credit for. I just don't pay attention to things sometimes. I've also been known to be rather cunning, loyal, happy-go-lucky, and well, dangerous. I can't help but show my true scales every now and then. But overall, I think I'm quite friendly for a dragonborn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never entirely welcome in the company of elves or men, Vax'ildan learned at a young age to skip past formality, preferring instead to invite himself in your door. Along with twin sister Vex'ahlia, Vax was born by a chance encounter between elven royalty and human peasantry. Raised by their mother in their early years, the twins were eventually sent off to their father in the elven capital of Syngorn. But their cool reception among the elves there never warmed, and their time in the capital didn't last. The siblings stole away one autumn night and set out on the open road. After a few years of wandering, they eventually decided to return to their mother, and journeyed back to the lands of their youth. But instead of finding their childhood home, they returned to a pile of rubble. Their mother was gone, their home burned to ash. Pressing the townspeople for answers, they learned of the day the dragon came. With their ties all severed, Vax'ildan and his sister set out to find their fortune together in Tal'Dorei. An outsider since birth, Vax quickly learned to solve life's challenges in his own particular way, often by sidestepping them entirely. And when his knack for circumventing adversity isn't enough, the way of blades the elves schooled him in more than makes up the difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was at the age of ten when the two were taken from their mother, and brought to live in Syngorn, the isolated elven city for which their father was an ambassador. He quietly took them in, but always kept an icy distance, and after too many years of disdainful looks, the pair decided to leave his indifference behind, and set out on their own. Vax took to the cities, stealing small trinkets and learning the ways of the thief, while Vex kept to the woods. She preferred the isolation. Always the keen observer, she learned to hunt and to track, to spy and to shoot. Through a series of fateful events, earned herself a companion in the form of a bear-- her own stolen Trinket-- to fight alongside her and protect her fiercely. Also, he is adorable, and gives expert massages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've got Fireball, so I think we're good for the next venture. Anyway, the party has taken their rest for the evening. Once again, this is one of those weird experiences where you wake up, not because of the sun rising, because you can't see it in the dwarven city of Kraghammer, but eventually you all come to consciousness naturally. What is your plan of action?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Jesus, we should have all talked about this while we were all peeing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to beat up everybody, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to the manor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we have brunch, and we go to the manor--

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Brunch?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eggs benedict.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want dwarven brunch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want a traditional dwarven breakfast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dwarven eggs are very good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're small.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Tiberius fills you all in about his experience, trying to get into the House Thunderbrand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How you almost got killed?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I didn't, certainly not. I just couldn't get in the door. Rather rude!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did you think that after the magic hand failed that the big thunder ice wave would work?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What I thought is that I could cover the rune with ice and merely step over it. I didn't think it would dissolve my ice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you sleep?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. I had to make sure, you know.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: A good sorcerer always all his tricks before turning around, which is what I did. I think we should go back there because I feel that it's significant that I couldn't get in so easily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will go back there. I don't think it's the next order of business but I think that we're not leaving the city without dealing with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we need to do something with the comment cards?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you not fill out your comment card?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I did! I know, like, three letters, so like A, F, and A.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds very positive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the thought that counts, Grog. It's the thought that counts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you put a smiley face next to the A-F-A?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I covered my hand in ink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That works.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very good. I think that went well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shall we try to make our way to the manor, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Greyspine Manor, with our cask of fancy ale/wine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the light ever change being underground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: LAURA:I feel really sleepy and also very awake at the same time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, dwarves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what do you think?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I'm curious if there's dwarven coffee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way after your brunch, your delicious dwarven brunch--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- which is very alcoholic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like being in New Orleans for the weekend, every meal is going to come with something alcoholic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're turning yourself into a dwarf?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you catch that? He just turned himself into a dwarf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius went (whoosh) into a dwarven form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of dwarf? What do you look like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's very handsome for a dwarf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you a girl dwarf?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! You should be a lady dwarf.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, what kind of dwarf? A lady dwarf?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I would not do that again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you did do that, you did take it as a troll.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Almost! She shot off the penis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's where the troll dick came from.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Don't you remember, Vax? I was almost raped by trolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius then polymorphed into a female troll to try and Bugs Bunny them, not realizing that dwarves who are underground and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --trolls don't encounter female trolls often enough to have a one track mind. He nearly got himself in a very bad situation. That was remedied by the party attacking and Vex over here shooting off the troll's dick. Which then went in the bag of holding, which is disgusting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's also where the hashtag not all trolls came from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yup, hashtag not all trolls came from that game. That is horrible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god. Bring it back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bringing it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way to the residential district. The same guards are there who were there the previous night that encountered you guys so, as you roll up with an entourage-

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, there are four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can take them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi. I wave at Thompson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's actually not there. It's the two others that were with you. He is noticeably absent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Where's Thompson?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other and they're like, "He's been given the day off."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As you can see, we brought one of your citizens with us to show us a tour of the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Citizen? I haven't see you about. What's your name?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like Johnny New York.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shoot, we're in Kraghammer, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're in Kraghammer.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, Stronghammer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Johnny New York.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is it, Kraghammer, or what was it?" (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I meant--I meant Stronghammer. Kraghammer is my father's cousin's side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How drunk are you?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I've been drinking since I've woken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See, he is one of you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had a lot of breakfast.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh yay, 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tiberius Kraghammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, I haven't seen you around, but obviously it's a bit early to be that fucked up."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I've been very depressed, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, what's your business, if I might ask again? You already seen the statue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we saw the statue, but we wanted to get a better look at it. We brought this gift for the Greyspines and we wanted to present it to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two new Carvers step forward and look at it. "Ooh!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them's like, "I'll tell you what. If you let us taste a bit of that, we'll let you go."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, I mean, I've been drinking a lot of it, sure!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A thimble of it because if any of it goes missing-- Is it sealed? Can we tell if it's sealed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look at it. It does not have any sort of port or exit on it. It is just a solid barrel.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: LAURA:. If we open it, it'll ruin the barrel, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, that's right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can save you a bottle of it when we open it inside. We'll give it to you later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check for that. It's a very persuasion based encounter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I roll that one that failed me earlier or my little dice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The little dice! They haven't come out yet!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (high-pitched) My little, tiny dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Itty bitty dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Teeny tiny dice. Okay that's better, I rolled a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bring it back, we'll be looking forward to it."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do you have any flasks that we could use to fill them up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got some bottles, don't worry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll be waiting. If you don't show with the drink, we'll go right to our supervisor." They all nod.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, keep nodding. Here's the thing. I don't know if I can save four bottles worth, but I'll save as much as I can.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Just say yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, I've got it covered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On our father's good name, we will bring you some of this. That is a promise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a good name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, we're waiting." They all lick their lips a little. They part and let you guys into the residential district. You make your way to the very back. You can see House Greyspine. Once again, guys, for those who haven't been there before, it's a beautiful arrangement. The iron gate around it with spikes on the top. You can see the entire front yard, it's about a good 80 yard walk to the front of the building itself. It's a quite a distance from the front gate and that entire area is filled with like a stone garden with various small sculptures and interesting knick knacks they collected and put on display like as a small museum as you approach the front of House Greyspine. You get to the front door as a large double oak door about ten feet tall, four feet wide, currently closed. There is no handle on the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No handle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Things shock you here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go knock on the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to double check, see if there's a bell to ring or there seems to be some sort of calling--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easily enough, you see next to the door there is a small chain that protrudes from the stone wall. It has a small bulbous ball at the end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ding ding. Ding-a-ding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull it. Not a ding, but a large (clanging). It is a heavier chain than you expected. As you pull on it, you feel a large hammer-like object is slamming into a brass-type material as it echoes and resounds in the building. Definitely announcing your presence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, can I try?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you must, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boosh! It echoes into the house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just wanted to do that once! I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we ding-dong-ditch? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan perhaps a little ditty on strings will ease our introduction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll start singing a little jaunty welcoming song. (singing) Hello, hello, we're here to pay you calling. Hello, hello I don't know what rhymes with calling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Calling," at the very least. I thought you would go right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, are you going to play the music for the sake of playing music?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. About ten seconds pass before the door-- you hear a large (thudding) and one of the doors opens up. You see a dwarf, with long gray hair that's slicked back and pulled into a ponytail. A very small trimmed beard, very proper, steps out in long black robes and goes, "Can I help you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, Percival Fredrickstein von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You can call him Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're here to discuss some business with Lord Greyspine and we have, of course, brought gifts and our charming company.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As well as our dwarven compatriot to introduce us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, who? I am quite drunk right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you an awkward look. It's like a look of trying to place your face. "Which lord are you looking for?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually Nostoc.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is he the nice one? I would like the nice one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nostoc, I'm afraid, is currently working at the quarry, if he's who you're looking for."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, of course he is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If Gradon is here, is that his name? Gradon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you this look. "Gradem is not taking visitors."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a shame, we brought this half-barrel of ale right here and some--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And some very, very attractive mining contracts, but if there's no one here to talk about them--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you this look. "If you're talking mining contracts you want to head to the quarry and talk to, Lord--" Looking him up again in my notes. "You want to talk to Nostoc Greyspine. He's the one who runs the quarry. As far as the Ironkeeper himself-- I mean no offense, but only official political business."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, this is definitely official political business. I will also say, could you direct us to the quarry? We are new in town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Obviously. Have you not shown them where the quarry is, friend?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have no idea what's going even going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's been drinking since very early this morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's on vacation. You'll have to excuse him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I must say, I am having a wonderful time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, friends are in town, he's showing us around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What was your name, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dwarf gives you a subtle look, goes, "My name is Magrim. I am the servant of the Ironkeeper himself."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are filled with poise and sophistication, and of course, above all, protocol. I would not wish you to break protocol which is why some simple directions, for those of us who are wishing to do some official business. You'll be right on your way and your house will return to order.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. The Ironkeeper is not open to business outside of pre-approved political understanding."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you don't have a pre-approved meeting put within our ledger, you won't be seen."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course not, but for the mining contracts, however, wouldn't we need to speak to Nostoc? Is there any way-- I hear it's very hard to get down into the mines. It's very well-guarded, right? That's why we came to speak to him here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans over and looks at the cask of ale and says, "Down to the mines, you have to go to one of the chain platform posts at the edge of town that will bring you to the base area. Find your way to the mines there. That should be enough to get Nostoc's attention. The rest is up to you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely. Thank you so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One moment, before we adjourn-- (whispers) Do we want to try to get into this place, or are we just going to go to the mines?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Maybe we should talk to Nostoc first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And ditch this place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Every time we break into someone's house it turns out poorly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're trying to get to the mines, essentially.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think he's still listening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good man, good day. We'll be on our way, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Magrim, you've been wonderful. Thank you so much. We plan on keeping some of this ale and bringing it back to the household. Would you like some when we open the cask?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks down at the cask, looks up at you and says, "I would not turn down a sip or two."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely. We'll be sure to save you a small bottle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to turn invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's looking over there, you vanish. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do that?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm sneaking into the house.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To what end?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's awesome! Who cares? Light it up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know why!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's gone nuts!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are off the reservation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is that all your business?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I believe it is all of our business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, good day." He steps back into the doorway and closes the large oak doors. You are now standing in the foyer of Palace Greyspine. A luxurious foyer, the floor itself is a fine dark velvet red carpet. There are tapestries across the walls and small wooden end tables set at the edges of the hallway, this foyer area that contains sculptures and vases and plants that exist underground specifically. There's a large stairway that leads up into the upper portion of the house and two doors at each side that lead to rooms you no longer can see.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I use the earpiece and whisper: What are you doing, Scanlan?! What are you doing?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know! Give me 20 minutes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 minutes, that's okay! Let's all step away from the house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ask if he needs assistance or divergent--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Divergent?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Divergent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magrim wipes his hands and walks away going, "(sigh) Fucking foreigners."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I follow him where he's going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My nervousness, I let out a little bit of a fart as we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Why are you making it harder on yourself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 14 plus I'm invisible, plus two. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're invisible, I'll give you advantage on that. Go ahead and roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well. 14. Plus two. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you scamper by, behind Magrim, following him towards the kitchen area of the abode, Magrim stops and turns, rubs his stomach, goes (groaning) and continues walking forward, seemingly unperturbed by the sound.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm snooping around, trying to see if there's any lords or higher ranking individuals in the area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a wonderful music room, which contains a number of dwarven instruments that you've read of and many instruments that you know as well. You actually find another, what do you call it again? A shawm?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shawm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A shawm. You find another shawm within, more finely crafted than the one that you have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A gift of lords, if you will.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so tempted, but no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he have an earring on? Does he have one of our earrings?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not everyone, you only made a few.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just me and him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who all has an earring?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can talk to me, apparently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius, tell him to look for paperwork of something. For the mines!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Scanlan, look for paperwork of something else, and by the way, all of you should be hearing me right now, you all have the ear--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not everyone. You only made like five or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could only afford five.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's right. (clears throat) Do all those things, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's talking right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look about the household, you also come across a couple of bed chambers that are locked, pretty hefty lock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not going to try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's nearly finished, but it's an extravagant room with a large stone and dark metal throne, steps lead up to it, and its raised dais-like pedestal in the center of the room. A series of great magically glowing and flickering lanterns across them. There are two dwarves inside that are currently finishing up the stone work. They're doing various sorts of masonry and plastering in areas and carving out and chiselling out pieces of stone, and making them intricately carved in this flavor. Other than that the room is currently empty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. There's nothing to steal!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drop a deuce in the bedroom!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hashtag "gnomishdeuce."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Damn it, Scanlan! Just get out of there! What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You totally should!

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: An invisible poo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I might as well try one of the doors that's locked, and see if I can pick it, but I'm not good at that, so I'll try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do you have on your person any sort of thieves' tools?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a forgery kit, a poisoner's kit--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Forge some thieves' tools real quick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Climbing gear? And a whip.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, I have one of the earrings, and I say: Scanlan, what exactly is the purpose for this little escapade, and will it be ending shortly?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I reply?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, through the message-based ear enchantment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just trust me that I have no idea what I'm doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you wish to pick one of the doors?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to try one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you have disadvantage on this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll twice, and we'll consider this a straight dexterity check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 11, plus zero?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it broke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do two spells at once, so I will give it up and I'll make my way to the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The door is currently closed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I become un-invisible and I cast Dimension Door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You blink through this small, purplish arcane doorway. It brings you directly outside. You guys are waiting, Scanlan just pops into view.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was crazy in there! People were farting everywhere! It was not me. They're building a throne room, there were some locked doors. Man, I wish you could have been there! It was exciting, but ultimately pointless. Let's go down to the mines!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to stress again that none of these dwarves are our enemies, at all. We just want to go have some words with Greyspine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That we do not have our healer, at present.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we do, but she's very distracted, and is not feeling herself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She wanted to stay at the inn this morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's feeling awfully BAFTA today, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's make our way to the mines, shall we?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Metal poisoning, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the mines, then, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go get this drunk dwarf!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exciting but pointless! You make your way to the edge of the center ring. You find that there are long spiral staircases that move to the bottom, where there are elevators that bring you to the bottom floor. The elevators are chain based, like a ratchet-type system with two Carvers there, of course. You approach one, eventually you talk with them, they lead you down there, but once again they give you a look of, "Watch your back!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We point at the ale and give him a thumbs up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They nod, and let you pass. As you continue downward into the lower area, you can see the red stone that lets a lot of the atmospheric glow of Kraghammer is used less and less and a lot more central torches are now in place; sconces. The stone itself is either rarer the further down you go or has less of an illuminating power the deeper into the earth. You eventually reach into the center part of town. You now see from where you're standing a number of large structures in the very center of the bottom part of the city of Kraghammer. You can see-- There is a giant domed temple that is made of gold and bronze in the center. It looks almost like a gargantuan gazebo that has doorways on each side that is currently closed off. No guards at it, though. You do see a number of other buildings. There is a large, heavy foundry far off to the left of you that has a little bit of smoke that's coming off of it, but most of it looks to be filtered into a giant, metallic funnel that is then placed into the rock. Almost like all the smoke based exhaust is being funneled outside of the mountain. That is the closest; that's the foundry. Then to the right of you, you wander a bit and you can begin to see that part of the mountainside to the far right has that look of a strip mine, or like a large portion of the minerals has been pulled away and is currently being mined further. That looks like probably one of the better places to look in looking for the Greyspine Quarry. You eventually make your way to the outside of the quarry. You now look down into three large pits that descend deeply into the side of the mountain. This mine has been going for quite some time and a large chunk of this looks like it may be being prepped; almost like the mine is what's growing Kraghammer. The more they mine into the mountain, the more they fill the mined area with further city construction. It's this self perpetuating cycle of expanding the city downward. Currently in the quarry, there are a number of large stone dwarven buildings in the edge of it, one of which is the largest of them all, looks like it's made more of a black and red, iron aesthetic; some of it's been oxidized a little bit and has that rough and tumble, iron feel. That one has the most guards around the base of it. The Carvers are gathered entirely around it. Looking down into the center of the quarry, towards the bottom there are a number of tunnels that lead into the hillside of Cliffkeep Mountains proper, surrounding Kraghammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go where the guards are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's walk towards the guards.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's just do this directly, I think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just swords out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Before we go up, I take the cask of ale and I grow some pretty flowers on it, and I make a nice pretty bow and I shine it up a little.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're making a fruit basket?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm just-- it looks attractive now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks like a fruit basket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not that ostentatious.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the "Ale of the Month" Club.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In her defense, they probably don't see flowers too often. It's a nice touch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is very fair.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to take this opportunity to cast Stoneskin on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Stoneskin is placed on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you a dwarf still?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you a dwarf made of stone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not turned Alter Self off. You are still a dwarf.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you revert back to your dragon form, robed self, but Stoneskin is in effect. You using your, what's it called again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Druidcraft.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Druidcraft! Thank you. The Prestidigitation for hippies. Portions of the wood begin to sprout from the outside of this dark wood barrel and form these entangled ivy vines that eventually embrace the entirety of this cask with little buds of dark, ruddy flowers. Something that would definitely appeal to a dwarven aesthetic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You approach the guards, of which there are eight currently at the front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my perception to see which one of them looks maybe the most interested or weakest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would be more of an insight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Insight! Which one of them looks most interested in our party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good. I thought that was a one, but it's not. It was a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Okay. Strangely enough, they are fairly distracted and after a rather long, uneventful morning, most of them are used to being in armor and waiting for business to go down. There are a few along the edges that look a little more alert, and one of them is looking occasionally down into the quarry. Just keeping an eye on the established area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one looks like the newest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The newest of the bunch would be the one that's on the far left that is looking down into the quarry as well. He has a shaved head, has a small brownish beard that looks like he's starting to grow out into a nice, long tuft. Either it got shaved in some, I don't know, terrible college dwarf accident. You know part of his entry into some fraternity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dwarf Sigma Sigma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not quite there and he probably gets a lot of shit for it from the other dwarves. He seems to generally be looking at you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, work your magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do your thing-- fuck these dwarves up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we trying to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We brought this gift. Hello! We address all of them, maybe, right now, yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She is better at this. I'm going to let her do this.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Hello, hi!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Greetings and salutations!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other guards reach back and grab their weapons. One of them looking to you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, you don't need that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look over at the shaved-head one and I hold his gaze for a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give Vex a little push forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pardon me. Not yet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, what's your business?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes, well-- we are here to speak with Nostoc. We brought a gift for him that's quite remarkable, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They curl up around the apparent barrel that Grog's holding. They look wary of Grog, but once they make note of the barrel they all, "Ooh!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right? It's the shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard of that, but I've not seen anyone actually drink it. There were long standing rumors that this even existed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It exists.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it's for Nostoc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is a Balgus original?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's what's holding his interest."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have my attention. What brings you to the mines?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should have talked this through before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, several things actually. Several things bring us to the mine. My name, of course, is Percival Fredrickstein von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: You can call him Percy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He raises his finger and goes, "You have not paid for your pleasantries yet."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, of course. Grog, if you would.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tap that motherfucker!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am assuming he had a goblet on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull it up he pulls under his desk and pulls up a goblet. As you fill it, "Top it off! Thank you! Now put on the side of the desk!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Puts it down. (satisfied sigh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it as amazing as we've heard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually he finishes his tankard, sets it down under the desk again. "Right, so where were we?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were here to call upon your expertise. We imagine that we are not the first strangers to Kraghammer to come through--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- in the last few weeks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the last few weeks. We believe one of our compatriots had some dealings with you, perhaps not as pleasant as the dealings we are hoping to have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lady, in fact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A halfling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, as you say that, he gets this grin to his face and goes, "Aye, I know of the one you speak."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She is a strong-headed one, that one."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She stepped on a few toes around this place."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, was she clumsy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One could say that, aye. You say you are compatriots of hers?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're here to mend any broken bridges, so to speak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or broken toes, if you will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this strange vision quest she kept talking about. It brought her into atmospheres-- portions of this city, portions of my business that she has no right trespassing on. She went against Carver rules, she broke away from partial arrest and she went screaming down into the caverns of our mines without my permission, blade drawn on some crazed suicide mission."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? We'll go after her. We'll bring her out. We'll get her out of your mines.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great. I'd like that actually."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'd be happy to clear out anything unpleasant that we happen to find in there in the meantime."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How did she look?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She looked small and angry. She seemed to have some weight to her. She was a strong lass."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So not a looker is what you are saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you this strange look and goes, "I will not discuss the physical aesthetics of a halfling."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The dwarf is a feminist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much would this task be worth to you? Obviously we are doing you quite a favor and we brought you quite a gift!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This cost us a thousand gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Obviously this lass means a lot to you, doesn't she?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I know she is probably wreaking havoc on your mines.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've come to correct the wrongs that she's done and come to bring her home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It also sounds like there are some other terrible things wreaking havoc on your mines.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is nothing going on, we're fine. We have everything under control, we don't need your help for that. If you want to find your friend, go find her! If she is still alive. If not, take her corpse back and leave."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not help, sir. We are simply respecting you as a businessman. As a businessman I'm sure that you would disagree with unceremonious charity whether it would be to give it or receive it. We are making sure that our dealings with you are fair and balanced.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate your offering. You have bought your time. Now, if you are here to go find your friend, I'll let you pass. You may pass into the mine, but if at any moment you cross over to any sort of thieving bullshite--" Looks over at you. "I recommend--" (laughter) "I recommend-- that you fall down the same path your friend likely did and get killed real quick. I don't take kindly to those who cross on my business."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I doubt that we could find anything of more value that what we have already brought you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are here to right wrongs and I promise you, our business is finding her and returning home."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then go."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that our business?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we are here to right wrongs and right lefts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And write comment cards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, before we dive into this mountain-- we know that there's ghouls and god knows what else down there. Shouldn't we find out?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, we should. Maybe some arcane house could tell us how to deal with these things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Do we have permission to enter within the next few days? Obviously we might need to be prepared.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, do we have badges that we wear over so that they know--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll speak with the men. They'll let you down. If you come back, good on you. I think our business here is done."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Please, shove off."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which way do we go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks over to the two other guards who are up front. The two Carvers say, "This way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While he is talking I take a flask out of my cloak and approach the barrel and surreptitiously pour a little bit of it into the flask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're stealing beer?!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, because we have to give it to those guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck those guards, I can kill them all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I talk to good old Nostoc while he's doing that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He currently does not seem like the talkative type at the moment, you can certainly try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to make a fumble. I am going to attempt to assist a sleight of hand with a bit of a fumble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has already rolled it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it. I am going to fall down. In front of Nostoc.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am going to fall down in front of Nostoc.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is distracted by a bell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you fill your flask--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. Balls. Ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this loud-- (clears throat).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow, oh my ankle! It hurts so very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the first time you have witnessed the pristine, delicate yet well trained palm of a dwarven hand go straight to its forehead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I carry the flask up to his cup and refill it and say: In my kingdom when a deal is set we drink together. I would like, not much, but to pour us all a drink and agree, surely this cask is weeks' worth of drink--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Get out of my office."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take the flask, take the flask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can see it is a cultural difference, my apologies.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Stop it. Just go! What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're one to talk!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm on the earring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're like-- They start leading you outside and as you make your way outside the main building, you can now hear voices shouting, down in the quarry below.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I lean down to one of the guards and say: What is that bell for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Something is flushing out of the quarry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Flushing, what does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We don't know." Some of the guards are motioning each other to follow and some of them start going down to one of the tracks that leads down to one of the nearest quarry below.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just try and like practically usher our guards in that direction, since they seem to want to go in that direction. Let's see if we can push them in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys follow down towards the quarry, you ask the guard that question and he goes, "I don't know, we've had quite a few interesting things come through."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like what? Oh, like what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He swallows and says, "Things I can't describe."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we can certainly help, lead on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anybody running out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet. As you head halfway down the quarry walkway, you begin seeing dwarves start running out of one of the large quarry tunnels.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still walking down the side. They're a good 100 feet from you. They start running at you, you see blood streaking down one of their faces.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're charging out, one of them has a weapon and is limping, and you start seeing small green scampering things rushing through. One, two, three, four, six, ten goblins come rushing out of the tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, I don't like these guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should attack them! I string my bow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't you have family history with them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three dwarves that are running out, one of them gets hacked down by one of the goblins and jumps on them and is tearing his neck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take a shot. Right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take a shot. I shoot it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both you guys roll--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I throw a dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You throw a dagger? Three of you, roll for attack.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is there a clear area where there's a bunch of goblins running?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is an open funnel towards the tunnel.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to throw a little Fireball, right there where those guys are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're still a little small to see, but you're all pretty well trained and pretty honed with your aim. You fire simultaneously, gunshot echo through the hallway, arrows, flying dagger, you see three goblins fall off a nearby dwarf who goes, "Thank--" At which point a large fireball explodes, killing off about ten or so of the goblins and probably two of the dwarves.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry about that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards stopped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you do that?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well go, if you're going to help, go!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We run straight in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With you guys charging in, you can now see a handful more goblins are rushing out. They are like running really fast, sprinting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I throw Entangle up, in the distance wherever they're coming from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what's the radius on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a hundred feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the range. What is the radius?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, 20-foot radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You find a portion of the central point where the things exit from the tunnel and these strange reddish vines begin to protrude and to begin to grab nearby goblins and pull them up in this massive, weird vine creature. You hear (stomping) and you now see two larger ogre-like creatures come storming out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck. Goddamn it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, do we have initiatives 25 to 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! I didn't roll yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You rolled a 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a 20 plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, you said?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 for Tiberius. What did you get? One? Aw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I rolled a two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's six with the plus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fellows. I don't like goblins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now see Scanlan, who's usually a jovial individual, his eyes begin to tense with fury.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like goblins.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anything that you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they will all die. Don't spare any of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Copy that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, buddy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have 27 initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten? Ten to five? Six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a sudden attack, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We weren't ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got a three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair I just cast Entangle. It works. I'm distracted holding Entangle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's fine. Then we have Scanlan. I'll get you guys in placement here, as your bear is currently back at the inn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you wanted to bring him along.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I thought I brought him. I should have mentioned that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, I should have emphasized that more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all right. Those of you going first, we're going to keep you on the field here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A number of goblins that are currently held over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're easy. Goblins are easy. Orcs are not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, those are mine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ogres?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round, Percy you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sitting down and I'm busting out Bad News.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bust out Bad News!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy stops just as he gets to the quarry, a little bit elevated, and he pulls out from a small sack on his back this large elongated contraption, this weird construction that looks similar to the pepperbox he usually carries, but much larger and cumbersome. He sets it up on the ground with a small stand at the front and preps itself with a visual point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ogre.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ogre back here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll for your attack with Bad News.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you used it before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, first time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His own tinkered construction, Bad News.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 30 attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, that'll do it. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that critical for you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 19 actually might.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 19?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that should critical for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does critical for me. I've never criticaled with this either. What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That means the damage dice you double. Roll for damage, double that, and add your modifier after that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on! Big money, no whammies. Yeah! Hell yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) 27 points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get after it, big man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that doubled?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's doubled.

lines.name: MATT
