lines.text: You guys hear this cacophonous, large blasting sound, a flash of blue energy and sparks shoot out the back of the weapon. It actually lifts Percy off the ground for a second and he shifts himself from the sheer blast. This streaking, heated bullet, reddish, white hot, goes cascading through the air, plunges into the side of the ogre's shoulder with a smattering of blood splattering against the cave behind it. It's actually moved back a step and has to catch itself. Slams its club into the ground. That ends your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't do anything after that. That's just reload.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, you're up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I move within 60 feet of those big fellows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bad news travels far and fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing travels faster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the entanglement, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Right before there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of these goblins are currently inside of it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to shoot a Scorching Ray at the big guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said he moved within 60 feet of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You moved up to here? All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're all entangled, yeah?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's good right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still have Entagle up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These guys here are entangled. These front goblins are not. Scorching Ray you said at which ones?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, oh there's a bunch of those dudes, aren't there? I'm going to do a Fireball instead, right in the center of the juiciness where I can get a couple little guys and both the big guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so I'd probably about there would be where you'd want it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to do that, and I'm going to spend two sorcerer points immediately to do quickening spell and do another spell right after that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you rush up, you pull back your hand and you see the arcane red energy begin to flow in your palm. You then throw the beam out, and it arcs, slams into the center, and explodes hitting each of these five goblins and the two ogres. What's your DC on your spell?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: My DC on my spell is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of your spell page on the right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! Wait. Oh! 17, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, okay. Wow! The two ogres actually make their saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Boo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They got 18 and a 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll crappier, ogres!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The goblins, however, all disintegrate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They get half damage because they made their reflex save. So 8d6 damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (counting) 27!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other ogre's looking okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He's a large creature isn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to use my second spell and do Telekinesis and pick one up and try to hurl him into the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Which one? The one left here?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The one that's beaten up already.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm hard right now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does fail his saving throw. You lift him up in the air and throw him into that. That ogre is knocked prone by the impact.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one is also knocked prone. Before (splatting) into the wall, both of them slam to the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With my vines, I make sure my vines really grapple him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I turn to Grog: They're all yours, buddy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll 2d6 impact damage for the force of the throw.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sweet! Impact damage? Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten damage to each of them?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Both of the ogres are now on the ground reeling from the impact. That brings us to Grog and Vex going simultaneously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ladies first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Well, all right. I'm going to cast Hunter's Mark on the most damaged one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that'd be this one here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Then I'm going to shoot Lightning Arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Do you want to move a little closer?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That would put you right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, cool. I'm going to shoot Lightning Arrow at them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can now see this crackling energy as you're pulling it taut in your bow. You let it loose, roll for attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! 21!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. You do the damage of the arrow plus the damage of the spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counting) 17!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Okay. The ogre that's been beaten, blasted by the fireball, it's getting up-- (grunt). It grabs its club, and it begins to get up on one leg as the Lightning Arrow slams into its chest. You can see it hits. Looks down for a second, and then the charge pulses through its entire torso. As it does, it screams out, "Ugh!" into the cavern, its whole muscle system locks tight and it falls forward again, onto its chest, smoke rising off of its whole upper area, unmoving, on the ground. He is gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dang! Come on now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Then the other one takes 2d8 if he fails his saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, with a one, he does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Oh, he fails it so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead a roll damage for other ogre.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two. ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten damage. Nice. As he falls to the ground, the arc arcs over to the other one who drops his club for a second. Picks it up angrily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can reassign my Hunter's Mark to him now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, all right. That brings us to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, my Hunter's Mark! I didn't do my Hunter's Mark damage. But it doesn't matter. He's dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't matter. You killed him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just ultra killed him! (valley girl voice) He is so dead. Oh my god. This ogre is done. (normal voice) All right. The other ogre's angry. It's now the goblins' turn. These goblins rush up. They are dashing forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (valley girl voice) They are so dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone make an insight check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insight check? Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What happened? Why are we doing this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I literally get a one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) Natural 20! On an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 total. 20.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural one. I'm really not paying attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're dealing with the fact that you just fired your gun for the first time and it burned your hands a little. You're like "Ugh!"

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Recites poetry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is familiar with one thing, fear in the eyes of his enemies. Looking at these goblins, they're not charging to attack. The attacks seem to be instinctual. They are running.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are scared.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are fleeing from something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From the ogres?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Something behind the ogres.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I make a request that you kill them anyway?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, it's your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to rage! And I would like to move to the right of all those stinking goblins!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right over here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, a little more to the right. Yeah, a little more. Yeah, keep going. All the way flanking it there. Yeah. Yeah, and then I would like to give them the cleanest shave possible with my greataxe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll for attack on the first one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18 plus eight. That's 26?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitively hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, damage, crap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) Decapitation!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two plus the four. 13!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't even feel resistance. You hear this little (wheeze) sound as this being is bisected.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that was cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its head and upper torso rolling off to the side before rolling to a stop. However, the inertia of your axe still keeps through to the one on the other side of you. Go ahead and roll for your second attack on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that was eight plus seven is 15!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lift backward, and it's stuck to the edge of your axe. Just limply dangling against-- you shake it off a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Double prizes! Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does with an 18. However, the ogre gets about that far. It's going to make a double move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Double move?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's running.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have Entangle up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. He managed to resist it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He saved against it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a big ogre.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ogre takes his full turn to get up in melee with you guys. It does not have its attack since it used its full movement there. Once again, you see as it's lumbering forward, it also has this look in its eye of desperation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh crap.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We should just let it pass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it is Vax's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My sister's right in the face of the ogre, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excellent. I'm going to take a run towards my sister, since she's right close to him, he's distracted so I'm going to turn just as I get to her, so my back presses against hers and swing around and sneak attack two daggers up in his belly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've practiced this, I turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you dodge to the side, this blur of shadow and speed, you coast up to the side of your sister, dagger both plunge towards the side of the ogre. Go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. One. Then the other one I do a poison dagger, gets a (singing) 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, put it on him brother!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is dagger of venom, 1d4. Three, plus two is five, and then is the sneak attack damage go with--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah it does because you have another ally adjacent to it. You don't get advantage on the attack roll, but you can still do the sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Critical hit, too, as well, wouldn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! You can multiply the sneak attack damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five, plus- and the double goes to the sneak attack damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does. Modifiers don't double, but any dice you roll double.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine, 15--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In my game. (clicks tongue)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So 30 plus five, 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The poison's not going to factor in. You swing past her, both blades jam right into the side of its rib cage. You hear it howl out in pain. As it does, you twist the daggers in a way where both blades are now going in two different directions, and you carve out a section of its entire abdomen. As you do, the flesh, like whale blubber, sloughs off the sides of it. Organs spill out, intestines, and it looks down and tries to pull them back in. You see the color draining from its face, and you lean up and kick it down. The ogre and falls to the ground lifeless, destroyed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You gave him just enough time to regret everything that had ever happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done. Bad life choices.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't call my mom enough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There are two goblins left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two goblins left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I do a quick sprint jog up up towards Grog and go (boof) and bring up a big stone wall. Right where that entrance is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. Like, right where things are pouring out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Wall of Stone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wall of Stone-- boom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. A giant wall of stone now completely seals off that part of the mine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know what's in there, we should talk about this for a second, and I bought us some time. I'm sure it's going to try to beat through that door in a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to say that you moved up to there with your movement. All right, I'd say probably over here, not right next to the goblins and that will give you enough range. Okay, so the wall of stone-- (boom)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any guards around still? Any dwarven guards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are all watching you do this now. They don't want to put their lives at risk, and you guys seem intent on getting into the middle of this battle, so they are going to sit back and let you do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's coming?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, you are so hardcore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not good at this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You speak goblin?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (tearfully) What's coming?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a pity roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A very gentle attempt at intimidation, however, the message gets across. The guards look at you, taken off guard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are about to die. It is in your best interest to tell us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're put together. Something's making things down there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What kind of things? From where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they're talking, you hear a (boom) against the stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (clicking) Sitting down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bring out my blade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stone cracks, and you can see a noticeable crack and an audible (cracking).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm running right now diagonally towards the wall and I press against the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good call. I do the same thing on the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you come over here. Do you want to bring Trinket with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're all so fancy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Stoneskin on myself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're stealthing, I'm stealthing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll stealth both of you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How tall are the walls? I mean the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the ceiling right now is the rest of Kraghammer for the most part.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hundreds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is a huge ceiling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's in the middle? Are those fires?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are braziers here. By the way, Stoneskin goes, this disappears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The entanglement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a piece of stone that rises about 15 feet, and these are both braziers for light in the center of the area. Yeah, it's hundreds and hundreds of feet up. You can look up to the very top of Kraghammer from here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anywhere else you want to go? Right now, we're technically not in combat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right. We're out of combat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Briefly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm breathing deep, taking aim at the wall, resetting everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I move up behind that pillar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm staying far back at the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back here. Both of these goblins-- I'll just say that you guys end up taking them down. It's not even a question. You step on them and crush them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any dwarves that we can say to go get Ballsack and bring him down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, Balgoos! Balgus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else want to move anywhere?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just taking aim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one's has taken any damage yet, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not currently, no. You guys have had a pretty clean sweep into this battle, so far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't inspire anybody here? Now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can inspire anybody. Just give them a dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I inspire everyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can spend all your uses to inspire as many people as you have the uses of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have mine that I haven't used yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) I think you're really handsome and nice! You're going to have inspiration dice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thought you were going to have a little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, some beautiful song for us! Wait, what for all of us? We all get a d8?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can add it to an attack roll, a saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (plays tune on electric piano app)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, are you going to stay where you are, are you moving anywhere? Last chance.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Is that cover right there next to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right over here? Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll get behind the cover. I'm going to peek out and I'm going to cast Blur.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Stoneskin goes away.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can't do both?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. They're both concentration spells.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, I leave Stoneskin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Stoneskin stays on. At which point (boom) the stone breaks through scattering across the ground. Immediately bursting through--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've encountered a naga before, which is a large serpentine creature with a humanoid head. However, this one is swollen, it is bulbous. The way it moves looks unnatural and it has affixed to it not one, not three, but five other different colored naga heads stitched to its body. It is a seriously terrible abomination. As it breaks through the stone, (hisses and growls) all the heads rear back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do naga heads do something if you look at them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're beginning back at the top of the initiative order.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! I got a question! My Hunter's Mark, can I transfer it to that thing or do I have to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because this still part of the encounter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have to take new aim or can I have myself already trained on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've had a moment to train. You haven't seen the creature until it just burst out, so it would take you a round to aim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking my round to aim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're aiming. That brings us to Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What did you just do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just took aim. Took aim. Just a gun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we roll initiative again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm keeping the same initiative order.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This gun doesn't do anything fancy. Just shoots really far, really hard.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay! I'll do a Scorching Ray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scorching Ray, all right. It makes a saving throw. It does not! Rolled a two, so full damage on it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Two-- four. Let's shoot two of them right now, right, three of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an aimed ray attack?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you have to roll for the attack. Roll a d20 and add your--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll high, roll high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of your spell page.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! That's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? 23 hits.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, okay. Then that's 2d6. That's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage to the naga. That brings us to--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait. I roll for the second shot, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you fire one beam off and it slams into the side of one of the naga heads. The second you bring back and as you do there's a flicker of arcane instability. His arm shakes as he releases the surge of scorching energy as it blasts into the side of the naga. Also, does not make a saving throw again! Roll full damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit, Tiberius.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Multiplied? Or did you roll a 12?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I rolled a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. Times two. 24 points of damage.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! I'm terrible at math! Stay in school, kids!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a good time to note our charity, 826LA.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not yet. Don't donate yet. Donate next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next week, you can donate to then. All right, so that brings us to the end of Tiberius' turn. You want to move at all, are you staying where you are?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll stay right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog and Vex, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ladies first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Me! Okay, I'm going to shoot-- oh god, I didn't realize I was going so fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll for stealth, by the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll for stealth, by the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a 20 for stealth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then yeah, he has no idea you're there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sees the bear going (growling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Trinket's going to hang out because I don't want to-- you know. I'm going to shoot Conjure Barrage. No, I'm just going to shoot him twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Arrow once, arrow twice, Legolas style.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am going to do the fire arrow thingy at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so using your bowstring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The blazing bowstring. Thank you, Tiberius!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That he created and crafted! All right so as you pull the second arrow out you nock it. As you let it, go it bursts into flames arcing halfway through the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was your to hit roll on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, that's four plus seven is 11.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't forget your inspiration!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well inspiration dice is to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For the first one, plus for the blazing bowstring I can turn any arrow into a flaming arrow, doing additional ten fire damage. I'll roll that right now, which is this. Which is a seven!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An additional seven, so 18 total damage and that arrow (impact) in the side of its body. One of the serpent heads reels back from the pain. It begins snatching at where the arrow's now protruding from it, trying to break it off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to roll again! That's a 24!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. That's an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're on deck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven plus seven is 14!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 damage, all right. Both arrows sink into it. Definitely piercing through the scales a little bit, but not sticking too deeply into its body; it's definitely a hearty creature. Grog, you're up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, I would like to run around the other side of the rock, raging, spit flying out my of my mouth! I would like to use the chain of returning, also crafted by Tiberius, attach it to the end of the greataxe, and throw it from where I am at the snake.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chain, that's wrapped around your wrist, keeping it attached to you, in some degree. Go ahead and roll for the attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight, nine, 17!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? It just hits!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, nice. That is 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage. The axe embeds itself pretty deeply into the torso.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I didn't do my Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll Hunter's Mark damage right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, chatroom! Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six? Awesome. Six damage. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This says, "An athletics-strength check is required to pull the weapon free, the DC 12?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, a d20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a DC 12.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. Balls. Taint. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your athletics!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! That's bound to be good. Seven! It's 12!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 is the DC! So yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (elated laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull back the chain and as you do, the blade is resisting, it's stuck in the torso and it actually (whoosh) and flies back, and you barely catch it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (nervous laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love your joy sounds!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Meant to do that! Meant to do that of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's its turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bursts of wind)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Why me? No, that's not me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it goes behind to Keyleth and Tiberius, it makes an attack with each of its five heads. Two on Tiberius, three on Keyleth. Remember, you guys have Stoneskin, so I believe you have resistance against damage, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh yes, I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. Against Keyleth, it's a natural 20.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 12 plus seven, that's going to be a 19 to hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two critical hits, and a hit on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is this bullshit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On Tiberius, that's a 22 to hit and a 13 to hit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: One does, one does not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. Against Keyleth, you take--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm glad I cast Stoneskin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's two plus four, that's six, damage halved, you take three damage. Oh, sorry. Three multiplied by two because it's a critical. So you take six damage from the first strike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's nothing! Six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not too bad. You take seven damage from the second strike, and another six damage from the 3rd strike. Actually, it would have been six, four and six. Because you have resistance on the damage because of Stoneskin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six, four and six?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. However, make a constitution saving throw. As venom from the fangs of the naga begin to pulse into your bloodstream.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What am I--constitution.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one? Natural one on the constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a bad day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel this burning pain pulse into your bloodstream, as your whole body doubles over from the pain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth dies in episode one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 31 points of poison damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 31, on top of the six, four and six?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The poison damage is not halved because it is not a physical attack on your body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Keyleth unconscious?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatcha got?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, you manage to physically resist the poison in your system. You feel that slight tinge, the muscles tense, but then your dragonborn form begins to shrug off the effect of the venom.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can I turn to him and blow fire out of my nostrils?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True dragonborn challenge. That brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I start jogging backwards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Took me down to 16 hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I sneak attack while prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're stealthed currently, so you would technically get a sneak attack, but you have to be in melee for you to get the other bonus. It would be sneak attack for this damage if you were to roll or if you were to throw a dagger at it, you would get the sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that means one throw instead of two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can throw both daggers at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I feel so inspired by Scanlan's bardic tunes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can add it after you make the roll by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you do a really good roll then you don't need it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, 19 plus 11 is 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're a rogue, isn't that critical for you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two criticals!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The other one, the other one is a 16 plus, plus-- is a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're used to throwing around--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I meant to say I was aiming at its eye, the main head's eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you should've said that first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For flavor it's fine. Just go ahead, it's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 44, that's the first dagger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 44 damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rogues, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Help me. Help!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's just one dagger?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's just one. Four plus two is six. Is that sneak attack? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, only one sneak attack per turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 40 and then six on the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One actually hit one of the heads, one of the various naga heads directly into its face. As it does it goes through both eyes and you can see it begin reeling from the attack. It's looking pretty rough, actually. The stitches beginning to come apart at some of the seams and you can see a black ichorous liquid spill out from some of the suture marks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a reminder the daggers, folks, blink back to the belt on my waist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because magic. Magic rogue shit. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I'm really upset, really hurting. Out of anger I take my staff and I go (bam) and I crack and do Thunderwave pushing him back 15 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Makes the saving throw. He gets pushed back, so he takes damage, just half damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 2d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're setting up your gun it gets slammed right point blank to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh sorry. It takes four damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four damage, all righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'm going to turn into an eagle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) As one does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for that, because I forgot to bring an eagle, you're now a-- (eagle sounds)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I fly away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Far, far, away.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where are you going?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell our story, Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's pretty great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I cry in the corner and rock back and forth a little bit. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I forgot to mention you actually take half damage for the saving throw for the venom so you still would've taken 14 points of poison damage, so mark that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is half damage on a save. That brings us to Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I bonus inspire myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're Scanlan I'll say, yes. You have such a high opinion of yourself that even you could inspire yourself. So yes, why not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) It would help me to acquire some dice to inspire. (speaking) I inspire myself first and move five feet back so I'm on the same row as him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not that far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Them I'm going to cast Lightning Bolt at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Straight line that way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Straight line, that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to roll to hit. You just roll damage on that. I make a saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I didn't even need to inspire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your DC on the spell? Top of your spell list.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? That's a failure on its saving throw. Go ahead and roll 8d6.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 8d6?! Kill him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bards. Gets spells from other classes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you kill, I will take a shit on this table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. (sings a high-pitched note)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! Is this the first time you've--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never killed anything before!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Never killed anything in two years!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For the people at home, we live to hear Matt say:

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: "How do you want to do this?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I let the player describe their victory. As you sing to yourself to bolster your arcane energy, you release a shear bolt of energy. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The bolt of lightning begins in its tail and works its way up through its spine, slowly but painfully torturing it as it slowly, slowly feels the effect coursing through its evil body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of your bardic ability to actually shape sound from an arcane standpoint, a lightning bolt should be an instant flash of arcane energy, you actually cause it to crawl. You control it as it begins to cascade up the torso of this horrible abomination. As it does you can see the bolts splinter and destroy each suture wound as each of its heads begins to slough off the rest of the torso until nothing is left but the single head screaming into the air. As the bolt makes its way up the neck, its eyes burst out in a blast of energy. The body falls limp to the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can it have a lightning bolt shaped in an "S?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A Scanlan-shaped lightning bolt is burned into the torso of the strange naga beast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well done, Scanlan, well done!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dust settles, the adrenaline still pumping in your system, Scanlan. All the rest of the dwarves begin stepping down, putting their crossbows down, looking down at the little gnome that created a storm from its hands. One of them pats him on the shoulder and goes, "Well done."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. Just promise me you'll that tell Pike about this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because it was really cool, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was pretty cool."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the dwarves look into the tunnel that it came from and the one that you spoke to earlier goes, "So that's the kind of thing that's been coming out of there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks for the heads up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was really helpful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 7:00, though. Today was a special early edition because all of Geek & Sundry's going to South by Southwest.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Good job, dude!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dude, thank you, Zac!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: This is so much fun. This is the most fun I've had all week now until I die of stress behind the camera.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good! That's good.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Guys, I hate to end it so abruptly but we're actually packing up the cameras that are filming me now, our unit, everything, lights, and getting on a plane and heading to South by Southwest. We may stream tomorrow, we may not, we're flying blind, we'll see what stuff looks like when we get there. Thank you guys so much and we'll be back next week, 7:00pm. Next week guys, it's going to be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you all for coming!
